statements: SELECT report_id, report_title, report_description, report_author, report_date FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_author, report_description FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_title LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT report_id, report_title FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports;
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_author FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_description FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_author = 'John Doe' AND report_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT report_id, report_description, report_author FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_author IS NOT NULL AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_author FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports;
SELECT report_name, report_date, threat_level FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE threat_level='High';
SELECT report_date, report_name FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_summary FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT metadata_id, report_source, analyst_name FROM ReportMetadata;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, threat_level FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT threat_level FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports;
SELECT r.report_name, m.analyst_name FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports r JOIN ReportMetadata m ON r.report_id = m.report_id WHERE m.create_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT r.report_name, r.report_summary FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports r LEFT JOIN ReportMetadata m ON r.report_id = m.report_id WHERE m.report_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM threat_reports
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM threat_reports
SELECT report_content FROM threat_reports WHERE report_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT report_title, report_content FROM threat_reports
SELECT * FROM report_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC
SELECT * FROM threat_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_title ASC
SELECT report_title, report_content FROM threat_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT report_title, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM threat_reports GROUP BY report_title HAVING total_reports > 1 ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT tr.report_title, rk.keyword FROM threat_reports tr JOIN report_keywords rk ON tr.report_id = rk.keyword_id ORDER BY tr.report_title ASC, rk.keyword ASC

SELECT tr.report_title, rt.tag_name FROM threat_reports tr JOIN report_tags rt ON tr.report_id = rt.tag_id WHERE tr.report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY tr.report_date DESC, rt.tag_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports;
SELECT title, author FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, primary_motive FROM ThreatActors WHERE country = 'Russia';
SELECT sample_name, hash_value FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT ioc_type, severity, description FROM IndicatorsOfCompromise WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors WHERE country = 'Russia' AND primary_motive = 'Espionage';
SELECT sample_name, hash_value FROM MalwareSamples WHERE detected = FALSE ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT ioc_type, ioc_value, severity FROM IndicatorsOfCompromise WHERE severity > 7;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReport;
SELECT report_title, report_source FROM ThreatIntelligenceReport;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM ThreatIntelligenceReport;
SELECT * FROM ReportMetadata;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM ReportMetadata;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceReport;
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_source FROM ThreatIntelligenceReport ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT r.report_title, m.metadata_key, m.metadata_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceReport r JOIN ReportMetadata m ON r.report_id = m.report_id WHERE r.report_type = 'Malware';
SELECT t.actor_id, t.actor_name, ar.relationship_type FROM ThreatActor t JOIN ActorRelationship ar ON t.actor_id = ar.threat_actor_id;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM AttackPattern WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%ransomware%' OR pattern_description LIKE '%exploit%';
